detectors.description:
Bam.transferOwnership(address) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/82/82f6feb8feebb573cb66c59cac46fcd5ffd891f6_Bam.sol#77-81) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/82/82f6feb8feebb573cb66c59cac46fcd5ffd891f6_Bam.sol#79) 
	- owner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/82/82f6feb8feebb573cb66c59cac46fcd5ffd891f6_Bam.sol#79)

Bam.setTokenPrice(uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/82/82f6feb8feebb573cb66c59cac46fcd5ffd891f6_Bam.sol#123-129) should emit an event for: 
	- tokenPrice = _newPrice (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/82/82f6feb8feebb573cb66c59cac46fcd5ffd891f6_Bam.sol#127)

Bam.withdrawEther(address)._to (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/82/82f6feb8feebb573cb66c59cac46fcd5ffd891f6_Bam.sol#152) lacks a zero-check on :
		- _to.transfer(this.balance) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/82/82f6feb8feebb573cb66c59cac46fcd5ffd891f6_Bam.sol#155)
Bam.safeMul(uint256,uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/82/82f6feb8feebb573cb66c59cac46fcd5ffd891f6_Bam.sol#83-87) is never used and should be removed
